description.brazilian: Elimine 100 inimigos
description.english: Kill 100 enemies
description.french: Tuez 100 ennemis
description.german: Töte 100 Gegner
description.polish: Zabij 100 wrogów
description.schinese: 击杀100名敌人
description.spanish: Elimina a 100 enemigos

description.brazilian: Elimine 1.000 inimigos
description.english: Kill 1,000 enemies
description.french: Tuez 1 000 ennemis
description.german: Töte 1.000 Gegner
description.polish: Zabij 1000 wrogów
description.schinese: 击杀1000名敌人
description.spanish: Elimina a 1.000 enemigos

description.brazilian: Faça chover fogo do céu
description.english: Fire fell from the sky
description.french: Le feu s'abattit sur la Terre
description.german: Feuer fiel vom Himmel
description.polish: Z nieba spadł ogień
description.schinese: 火从天降
description.spanish: Ha caído fuego del cielo

description.brazilian: O mar raivoso invadia a terra
description.english: The angry sea raced across the land
description.french: La mer déchaînée se rua sur la terre ferme
description.german: Die zornige See raste über das Land
description.polish: Oto nagle przetoczyła się gniewna fala
description.schinese: 愤怒的海洋席卷大地
description.spanish: La ira del océano arrasó con la tierra

description.brazilian: O relâmpago recai sobre a terra amarga
description.english: Lightning smote the bitter Earth
description.french: La foudre s'abattit sur le monde amer
description.german: Blitze peitschten die bittere Erde
description.polish: W ziemię uderzył piorun
description.schinese: 闪电猛抽大地
description.spanish: Los rayos alcanzaron la condenada tierra

description.brazilian: A fúria do tornado embotou o sol
description.english: Tornado's fury blotted out the sun
description.french: La fureur de la tornade occulta le soleil
description.german: Die Wut des Tornados verdunkelte die Sonne
description.polish: Wściekłe tornado przyćmiło słońce
description.schinese: 龙卷风在日光下咆哮
description.spanish: La furia del tornado ha cubierto el sol

description.brazilian: Meu nome é...
description.english: My name is...
description.french: Je m'appelle...
description.german: Mein Name ist...
description.polish: Nazywam się...
description.schinese: 我的名字是……
description.spanish: Me llamo...

description.brazilian: Dê 10.000 passos
description.english: Take 10,000 steps
description.french: Effectuez 10 000 pas
description.german: Tue 10.000 Schritte
description.polish: Zrób 10 tysięcy kroków
description.spanish: Da 10.000 pasos

description.brazilian: Ela estava sozinha...
description.english: She found herself alone...
description.french: Elle se retrouva seule...
description.german: Sie fand sich alleine wieder...
description.polish: Była całkiem sama
description.schinese: 她发现自己孤身一人……
description.spanish: Se encontró sola...

description.brazilian: A floresta era um lugar de luz e paz...
description.english: The forest was a place of light and peace...
description.french: La forêt était lumineuse et paisible...
description.german: Der Wald war ein Ort des Lichts und des Friedens
description.polish: Las był miejscem jasnym i bezpiecznym
description.russian: Лес был местом света и мира...
description.schinese: 这片森林是个光明而宁静的地方……
description.spanish: El bosque era un lugar de luz y paz...

description.brazilian: A água estava por toda parte...
description.english: Water was everywhere…
description.french: L'eau était partout
description.german: Überall war Wasser
description.polish: Woda była wszędzie
description.schinese: 大水淹没了一切……
description.spanish: Había agua por todas partes...

description.brazilian: Ela sentiu frio...
description.english: She felt cold...
description.french: Elle avait froid...
description.german: Sie fror...
description.polish: Czuła chłód...
description.schinese: 她觉得好冷……
description.spanish: Sintió frío...

description.brazilian: Ela viu-se sob uma cidade voadora...
description.english: She stood below a skyborne city...
description.french: Elle se tenait sous une ville céleste...
description.german: Sie stand unter einer Himmelsstadt...
description.polish: Stała u podnóża sięgającego chmur miasta
description.schinese: 她站在一座天空之城的下面……
description.spanish: Permaneció bajo una ciudad cubierta por las estrellas...

description.brazilian: A mina estava abandonada há algum tempo...
description.english: The mine had been abandoned for some time...
description.french: Cela faisait un moment que la mine était abandonnée...
description.german: Das Bergwerk war seit langer Zeit stillgelegt...
description.polish: Kopalnia została opuszczona dawno temu
description.schinese: 这座矿井已废弃很久了……
description.spanish: La mina llevaba abandonada un tiempo...

description.brazilian: Ela estava em um lugar estranho...
description.english: She found herself in a strange place...
description.french: Elle se trouvait dans un endroit étrange...
description.german: Sie befand sich an einem merkwürdigen Ort...
description.polish: Znalazła się w dziwnym miejscu
description.schinese: 她发现自己到了一个陌生的地方……
description.spanish: Se encontró en un lugar extraño...

description.brazilian: Ela não sabia como tinha chegado ao deserto...
description.english: She didn’t know how she arrived in the desert...
description.french: Elle ignorait comment elle était arrivée dans ce désert...
description.german: Wie sie in die Wüste gekommen war, wusste sie nicht...
description.polish: Nie wiedziała, jakim cudem znalazła się na pustyni
description.russian: Она не знала, как оказалась в пустыне...
description.schinese: 她不知道自己是怎么到达这片沙漠的……
description.spanish: No sabía que había llegado al desierto...

description.brazilian: Chegue à velocidade média para caligrafia de 30 pal/minuto
description.english: Reach the average handwriting speed of 30WPM
description.french: Atteignez une vitesse d'écriture moyenne de 30 mots par minute
description.german: Erreiche die durchschnittliche Handschriftfrequenz von 30 WpM

description.schinese: 达到每分钟30个单词的手写速度
description.spanish: Alcanza la velocidad media de escritura a mano de 30 PPM
